data.title: Aishwarya Rai-Abhishek Bachchan divorce rumours abound as he likes Instagram post on separation
data.meta_description: Ever since Bollywood actor Aishwarya Rai Bachchan arrived at the grand wedding of
data.text:
Ever since Bollywood actor Aishwarya Rai Bachchan arrived at the grand wedding of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant without her husband Abhishek Bachchan by her side, there have been rumours that the famous Bollywood couple may be headed for a divorce.

Now, the Aishwarya Rai Abhishek Bachchan divorce rumours gained further strength after the latter liked an Instagram post on divorce.

The post, shared by a journalist was an article, read: "Divorce is never easy for anyone. Who doesn’t dream of a happily ever after or envision recreating those heartwarming videos of elderly couples holding hands as they cross the street? Yet, sometimes life doesn’t unfold as we hoped. But how do people cope when they separate after decades together, after spending a significant portion of their lives relying on each other for both big and small things?"

"What drives them to sever ties, and what challenges do they face? This story delves into these questions. Coincidentally, ‘grey divorces’ or ‘silver splitters’—terms for those seeking marital dissolution typically after age 50—are on the rise globally. The reasons, though varied, are not surprising," the post that Abhishek Bachchan liked further read.

There have been rumours of Aishwarya Rai Abhishek Bachchan divorce on social media for some time. However, Aishwarya Rai arriving at the star-studded Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant wedding along with daughter Aaradhya Bachchan without Abhishek Bachchan by her side gave fans and others more reasons to speculate about the divorce. Abhishek Bachchan had arrived at the wedding with his father Amitabh Bachchan and mother Jaya Bachchan.

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan got married in April 2007. They welcomed their daughter Aaradhya Bachchan in November 2011.
